channel.title: Music – Christopher Cross
channel.description: Recent content in Christopher Cross on Music

item.title: Christopher Cross - Sailing
item.description:
작곡: Christopher Cross / 작사: Words & Music by
KY: 79251 / KY: 7419

Well it’s not far down
to paradise
At least
it’s not for me
And if the wind is
right
You can sail away
and find tranquility
Oh the canvas can
do miracles
Just you wait and see
and believe me
It’s not far
to never-never land
Reason
to pretend
And if the wind is
right
You can find the joy
of innocence again
Oh the canvas can
do miracles
Just you wait and see
and believe me
Sailing takes me away
to where
I’ve always heard it
could be
Just a dream and
the wind to carry me
Soon I will
be free
Fantasy
it gets the best of me
When I’m
sailing
All caught up
in the reverie
Every word is
a symphony
Won’t you
believe me
Sailing takes me away
to where
I’ve always heard it
could be
Just a dream and
the wind to carry me
Soon I will
be free

Well it’s not far back
to sanity
At least
it’s not for me
And if the wind is
right
You can sail away
and find serenity
Oh the canvas can
do miracles
Just you wait and see
and believe me
Sailing takes me away
to where
I’ve always heard it
could be
Just a dream and
the wind to carry me
Soon I will
be free

item.title: Christopher Cross - Arthur's Theme (Best That You Can Do)
item.description:
작곡: Christopher Cross / 작사: Words & Music by
KY: 8019

Once in your life
you will find her
Someone who turns
your heart around
And next thing
you know
You’re closing
down the town
Make up and
it’s still with you
Even though
you left her way
Cross town
wondering to yourself
Hey what have I found
when you get taught
Between the moon and
New York city-
I know it’s crazy
but it’s true
If you get caught
between the moon and
New York city–
best that you can do
Best that you can do
is fall in love
Arthur he does
as he pleases
An of his life
his master’s toys
And deep in his heart
he’s just
He’s just a boy
living his life
One day at a time
he’s showing himself
A pretty good time
he’s laughing
About the way
they want him to be
When you get caught
between the moon and
New York city-
I know it’s crazy
But it’s true
if you get caught
Between the moon and
New York city– the
Best that you can do
best that you can do
Best that you can do
is fall in love-

When you get caught
between the moon and
New York city-
I know it’s crazy
But it’s true
if you get caught
Between the moon and
New York city–
Best that you can do
best that you can do
Best that you can do
is fall in love
When you get caught
between the moon and
New York city-
I know it’s crazy
But it’s true
if you get caught
Between the moon and
New York city–
Best that you can do
best that you can do
Best that you can do
is fall in love
When you get caught
between
The moon and
New York city-
I know it’s crazy
but it’s true-
